text: Just wondering, is there an ecommerce module built for cart functionality? I am creating an internal storefront webpage so that our employees can purchase branded clothing and accessories. Thanks in advance!
There is not one by default, there is an integration into Shopify for an ecommerce connector but not a "HubSpot" specific shopping cart integration. That is more backend reporting stuff
you can use Shopify's buy now JS cart buttons on the site though (or any ecom buy now embed stuff)
